schema.name: species_key
schema.description: Internal key used in the source JSON for this species entry (e.g. 'Escherichia_coli_str_K_12_substr_MG1655_str_K12')

schema.name: scientific_name
schema.description: Full scientific name of the organism

schema.name: taxon_id
schema.description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier of the organism

schema.name: common_name
schema.description: Common name of the organism (if available)

schema.name: type
schema.description: Type label for the species entry (freeform, e.g. 'strain' or other classification)

schema.name: type_class
schema.description: Type class for the species entry (e.g. 'strain', 'subspecies', 'isolate')

schema.name: biosample_id
schema.description: Biosample identifier associated with the strain (e.g. SAMN...)

schema.name: release
schema.description: Provider release identifier or date key (e.g. '2018_09')

schema.name: homologies
schema.description: Whether homology files are available for this provider/release (true/false)

schema.name: variation
schema.description: Whether variation files are available for this provider/release (true/false)

schema.name: regulation
schema.description: Whether regulation files are available for this provider/release (true/false)
